title: Part 3: Control and Manipulation (Questions 29-45)
description: Dive deep into the core algorithms that enable robots to move, interact, and perform complex tasks with precision and intelligence.

title: Part 5: Human-Robot Interaction (HRI) (Questions 64-78)
description: Explore the complexities of building robots that can safely and intuitively interact with humans, from understanding voice and gestures to modeling emotions and long-term relationships.
